t: 5 Reasons to Be Excited About Frisco's First Amazon Store
s: November 8, 2019 - Amazon seems to get the Frisco shoppers’ vibes on this one because they’ve brought us a brand new, shiny Amazon 4-star Store! Now open at Stonebriar Centre, it’s the first Amazon 4-star in the greater Dallas region and sixth location nationwide.

t: Amazon opens 4-star store in Stonebriar Centre in Frisco | Fort Worth Star-Telegram
s: November 6, 2019 - The online retail giant is moving into brick-and-mortar stores with its sixth Amazon 4-star store. The store in Frisco will sell trending items and products rated four stars or higher on the website.
